vlive.korean: "자신들의 곡으로 무엇이 가장 좋아하나요?" "Which song do you like the most among your songs"? 듣기 View video GOT7 : 유겸!
vlive.english: "Which song do you like the most among your songs"?

vlive.korean: 이런 거 진짜 너무 좋아 - "이번 콘서트에서 가장 자신들이 기대하는 곡은?" I love comments like that. - "Which song are you looking forward to the most at this concert"? 듣기 View video NCT : D-5💚💚💚💚💚💚
vlive.english: I love comments like that. - "Which song are you looking forward to the most at this concert"?

vlive.korean: [그래 건강이 최고지!] 일단 자신들의 잠과 건강을 선택하였습니다. everyone chose their own sleep and health first. 듣기 View video MAMAMOO : [MMMTV4] EP14 미션은 너나해
vlive.english: everyone chose their own sleep and health first.

vlive.korean: 자기 자신들, 하고 다니는 단체를 개나리라고 칭했죠. our fans called themselves as Forsythia. 듣기 View video SECHSKIES : [REPLAY] 젝키의 Re모콘 (SECHSKIES's Remote Control)
vlive.english: our fans called themselves as Forsythia.

vlive.korean: 자신들의 곡을 무대에서 보여줄 준비가 된 모두를요. and be able to get on that stage to showcase what they do. 듣기 View video WAV : [Versus]: Ep. 8.3 Finale
vlive.english: and be able to get on that stage to showcase what they do.

examples.korean: They soon realized they had been duped. 발음듣기 그들은 곧 자신들이 속았음을 깨달았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They soon realized they had been duped. 발음

examples.korean: They left entirely of their own volition. 발음듣기 그들은 전적으로 자신들의 자유 의지로[그들 자신이 원해서] 떠났다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They left entirely of their own volition. 발음

examples.korean: People were terrorized into leaving their homes. 발음듣기 사람들이 공포에 사로잡혀 자신들의 집을 떠났다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: People were terrorized into leaving their homes. 발음

examples.korean: The photographers pursued their quarry through the streets. 발음듣기 사진 기자들이 거리거리로 자신들의 사냥감을 쫓아다녔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The photographers pursued their quarry through the streets. 발음

examples.korean: Screaming fans vied to get closer to their idol. 발음듣기 환성을 지르는 팬들이 자신들의 우상에게 더 가까이 다가가기 위해 다퉜다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Screaming fans vied to get closer to their idol. 발음
